record.field:
ExaVault's API allows you to incorporate ExaVault's suite of file transfer and user management tools into your own application.
ExaVault supports both POST (recommended when requesting large data sets) and GET operations, and requires an API key in order to use. settings

form.string:
Configure ExaVault's API allows you to incorporate ExaVault's suite of file transfer and user management tools into your own application.
ExaVault supports both POST (recommended when requesting large data sets) and GET operations, and requires an API key in order to use.
